card.name: Angry Mob
card.property: Trample During your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. During turns other than yours, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each 2.

card.name: Blood of the Martyr
card.property: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to any creature, you may have that damage dealt to you instead.

card.name: Brainwash
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Cleansing
card.property: For each land, destroy that land unless any player pays 1 life.

card.name: Dust to Dust
card.property: Exile two target artifacts.

card.name: Exorcist
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: Destroy target black creature.

card.name: Fasting
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a hunger counter on Fasting. Then destroy Fasting if it has five or more hunger counters on it. If you would begin your draw step, you may skip that step instead. If you do, you gain 2 life. When you draw a card, destroy Fasting.

card.name: Festival
card.property: Cast this spell only during an opponent's upkeep. Creatures can't attack this turn.

card.name: Fire and Brimstone
card.property: Fire and Brimstone deals 4 damage to target player who attacked this turn and 4 damage to you.

card.name: Holy Light
card.property: Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Knights of Thorn
card.property: Protection from red; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

card.name: Martyr's Cry
card.property: Exile all white creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller draws a card.

card.name: Miracle Worker
card.property: {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a creature you control.

card.name: Morale
card.property: Attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pikemen
card.property: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

card.name: Preacher
card.property: You may choose not to untap Preacher during your untap step. {T}: For as long as Preacher remains tapped, gain control of target creature of an opponent's choice they control.

card.name: Tivadar's Crusade
card.property: Destroy all Goblins.

card.name: Witch Hunter
card.property: {T}: Witch Hunter deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Amnesia
card.property: Target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards.

card.name: Dance of Many
card.property: When Dance of Many enters, create a token that's a copy of target nontoken creature. When Dance of Many leaves the battlefield, exile the token. When the token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Dance of Many. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dance of Many unless you pay {U}{U}.

card.name: Deep Water
card.property: {U}: Until end of turn, if you tap a land you control for mana, it produces {U} instead of any other type.

card.name: Drowned
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Drowned.

card.name: Electric Eel
card.property: When Electric Eel enters, it deals 1 damage to you. {R}{R}: Electric Eel gets +2/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Erosion
card.property: Enchant land At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, destroy that land unless that player pays {1} or 1 life.

card.name: Flood
card.property: {U} {U}: Tap target creature without flying.

card.name: Ghost Ship
card.property: Flying {U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.

card.name: Giant Shark
card.property: Giant Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Whenever Giant Shark blocks or becomes blocked by a creature that has been dealt damage this turn, Giant Shark gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Giant Shark.

card.name: Leviathan
card.property: Trample Leviathan enters tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan. Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

card.name: Mana Vortex
card.property: When you cast this spell, counter it unless you sacrifice a land. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a land. When there are no lands on the battlefield, sacrifice Mana Vortex.

card.name: Merfolk Assassin
card.property: {T}: Destroy target creature with islandwalk.

card.name: Mind Bomb
card.property: Each player may discard up to three cards. Mind Bomb deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards they discarded this way.

card.name: Psychic Allergy
card.property: As Psychic Allergy enters, choose a color. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Psychic Allergy deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of nontoken permanents of the chosen color they control. At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Psychic Allergy unless you sacrifice two Islands.

card.name: Riptide
card.property: Tap all blue creatures.

card.name: Sunken City
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sunken City unless you pay {U}{U}. Blue creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Tangle Kelp
card.property: Enchant creature When Tangle Kelp enters, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if it attacked during its controller's last turn.

card.name: Water Wurm
card.property: Water Wurm gets +0/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.

card.name: Ashes to Ashes
card.property: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.

card.name: Banshee
card.property: {X}, {T}: Banshee deals half X damage, rounded down, to any target, and half X damage, rounded up, to you.

card.name: Bog Imp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Bog Rats
card.property: Bog Rats can't be blocked by Walls.

card.name: Curse Artifact
card.property: Enchant artifact At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Curse Artifact deals 2 damage to that player unless they sacrifice that artifact.

card.name: Eater of the Dead
card.property: {0}: If Eater of the Dead is tapped, exile target creature card from a graveyard and untap Eater of the Dead.

card.name: Frankenstein's Monster
card.property: As Frankenstein's Monster enters, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. If you can't, put Frankenstein's Monster into its owner's graveyard instead of onto the battlefield. For each creature card exiled this way, Frankenstein's Monster enters with a +2/+0, +1/+1, or +0/+2 counter on it.

card.name: Grave Robbers
card.property: {B}, {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Inquisition
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. Inquisition deals damage to that player equal to the number of white cards in their hand.

card.name: Marsh Gas
card.property: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Murk Dwellers
card.property: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.

card.name: Nameless Race
card.property: Trample As Nameless Race enters, pay any amount of life. The amount you pay can't be more than the total number of white nontoken permanents your opponents control plus the total number of white cards in their graveyards. Nameless Race's power and toughness are each equal to the life paid as it entered.

card.name: Rag Man
Season of the Witch
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Season of the Witch unless you pay 2 life. At the beginning of the end step, destroy all untapped creatures that didn't attack this turn, except for creatures that couldn't attack.

card.name: The Fallen
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, The Fallen deals 1 damage to each opponent and planeswalker it has dealt damage to this game.

card.name: Uncle Istvan
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.

card.name: Word of Binding
card.property: Tap X target creatures.

card.name: Worms of the Earth
card.property: Players can't play lands. Lands can't enter the battlefield. At the beginning of each upkeep, any player may sacrifice two lands or have Worms of the Earth deal 5 damage to that player. If a player does either, destroy Worms of the Earth.

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Brothers of Fire
Cave People
card.property: Whenever Cave People attacks, it gets +1/-2 until end of turn. {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

card.name: Eternal Flame
card.property: Eternal Flame deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker and half X damage, rounded up, to you, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Fire Drake
card.property: Flying {R}: Fire Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Fissure
card.property: Destroy target creature or land. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Goblin Caves
card.property: Enchant land As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +0/+2.

card.name: Goblin Digging Team
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.

card.name: Goblin Rock Sled
card.property: Trample Goblin Rock Sled doesn't untap during your untap step if it attacked during your last turn. Goblin Rock Sled can't attack unless defending player controls a Mountain.

card.name: Goblin Shrine
card.property: Enchant land As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +1/+0. When Goblin Shrine leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each Goblin creature.

card.name: Goblin Wizard
card.property: {T}: You may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. {R}: Target Goblin gains protection from white until end of turn.

card.name: Goblins of the Flarg
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.) When you control a Dwarf, sacrifice Goblins of the Flarg.

card.name: Inferno
card.property: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Mana Clash
card.property: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

card.name: Orc General
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice another Orc or Goblin: Other Orc creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Sisters of the Flame
card.property: {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Carnivorous Plant
card.property: Defender

card.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
card.property: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Gaea's Touch
card.property: {0}: You may put a basic Forest card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn. Sacrifice Gaea's Touch: Add {G}{G}.

card.name: Hidden Path
card.property: Green creatures have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

card.name: Land Leeches
card.property: First strike

card.name: Lurker
card.property: Lurker can't be the target of spells unless it attacked or blocked this turn.

card.name: Marsh Viper
card.property: Whenever Marsh Viper deals damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Niall Silvain
People of the Woods
card.property: People of the Woods's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.

card.name: Savaen Elves
card.property: {G} {G}, {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a land.

card.name: Scarwood Bandits
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) {2}{G}, {T}: Unless an opponent pays {2}, gain control of target artifact for as long as Scarwood Bandits remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Scarwood Hag
Scavenger Folk
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Spitting Slug
card.property: Whenever Spitting Slug blocks or becomes blocked, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn. Otherwise, each creature blocking or blocked by Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Tracker
card.property: {G} {G}, {T}: Tracker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tracker.

card.name: Venom
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy the other creature at end of combat.

card.name: Whippoorwill
card.property: {G} {G}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. Damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn can't be prevented or dealt instead to another permanent or player. When the creature dies this turn, exile the creature.

card.name: Wormwood Treefolk
Marsh Goblins
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

card.name: Dark Heart of the Wood
card.property: Sacrifice a Forest: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Barl's Cage
card.property: {3}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Bone Flute
card.property: {2}, {T}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Book of Rass
card.property: {2}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

card.name: Coal Golem
card.property: {3}, Sacrifice Coal Golem: Add {R}{R}{R}.

card.name: Dark Sphere
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Dark Sphere: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent half that damage, rounded down.

card.name: Diabolic Machine
card.property: {3}: Regenerate Diabolic Machine.

card.name: Fellwar Stone
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Fountain of Youth
card.property: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Living Armor
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Living Armor: Put X +0/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's mana value.

card.name: Necropolis
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put X +0/+1 counters on Necropolis, where X is the exiled card's mana value.

card.name: Reflecting Mirror
card.property: {X}, {T}: Change the target of target spell with a single target if that target is you. The new target must be a player. X is twice the mana value of that spell.

card.name: Runesword
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Runesword. If the creature deals damage to a creature this turn, the creature dealt damage can't be regenerated this turn. If a creature dealt damage by the targeted creature would die this turn, exile that creature instead.

card.name: Scarecrow
card.property: {6}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by creatures with flying.

card.name: Skull of Orm
card.property: {5}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Standing Stones
card.property: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Stone Calendar
card.property: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Tormod's Crypt
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile target player's graveyard.

card.name: Tower of Coireall
card.property: {T}: Target creature can't be blocked by Walls this turn.

card.name: Wand of Ith
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player reveals a card at random from their hand. If it's a land card, that player discards it unless they pay 1 life. If it isn't a land card, the player discards it unless they pay life equal to its mana value. Activate only during your turn.

card.name: War Barge
card.property: {3}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When War Barge leaves the battlefield this turn, destroy that creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated. (A creature with islandwalk can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: City of Shadows
card.property: {T}, Exile a creature you control: Put a storage counter on City of Shadows. {T}: Add {C} for each storage counter on City of Shadows.

card.name: Maze of Ith
card.property: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Safe Haven
card.property: {2}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card exiled with Safe Haven to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Sorrow's Path
card.property: {T}: Choose two target blocking creatures controlled by the same opponent. If each of those creatures could block all creatures that the other is blocking, remove both of them from combat. Each one then blocks all creatures the other was blocking. Whenever Sorrow's Path becomes tapped, it deals 2 damage to you and each creature you control.
